Package ca.cmput301t05.placeholder.qrcode

Class QRCodeManager

java.lang.Object
ca.cmput301t05.placeholder.qrcode.QRCodeManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class QRCodeManager extends Object implements Serializable
Manages QR code generation and processing for events, including generating QR codes with event information, determining QR code types, and facilitating event joining through QR code scanning.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • QRCodeManager

      public QRCodeManager()
      Constructs a QRCodeManager object. This constructor is empty and does not perform any operations.

  • Method Details

    • generateQRCode

      public QRCode generateQRCode(Event event, String type)
      Generates a QR code for a specified event and type. The type determines whether the QR code is for event information ("eventInfo") or for check-in purposes.
      Parameters:
      event - The event for which the QR code is generated.
      type - The type of QR code to generate: "eventInfo" for an info QR code, any other value for a check-in QR code.
      Returns:
      A QRCode object containing the event ID encoded within the QR code along with its type.

    • checkQRcodeType

      public QRCodeType checkQRcodeType(String rawQRcodeString)
      Checks the type of the QR code based on its raw string representation. The type is determined by the string following the event ID in the raw QR code string.
      Parameters:
      rawQRcodeString - The raw string representation of the QR code.
      Returns:
      INFO if info, CHECK_IN if check_in, and ERROR otherwise

    • getEventID

      public UUID getEventID(String rawQr)
      Extracts and returns the event ID from a raw QR code string.
      Parameters:
      rawQr - The raw QR code string containing the event ID.
      Returns:
      The UUID of the event extracted from the raw QR code string.
